formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 1. Choose two primes p, q 2. n = p · q 3. φ(n) = (p − 1)(q − 1) 4. Choose e s.t. 1 < e < φ(n) and gcd(e, φ(n)) = 1 (common: 65537) 5. Compute d ≡ e⁻¹ (mod φ(n)) 6. Public key = (n, e), Private key = (n, d)
